sorcer.scratch

Interface ScratchManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdderDBProvider, AdderProvider, DatabaseProvider, ExertMonitor, IpcArrayProviderImpl, ScratchManagerSupport, ServiceCataloger, ServiceProvider, ServiceTasker, SessionBeanProvider, SysCallerProvider, WorkerProvider

    public interface ScratchManager
    Defines the semantics to produce scratch data and scratch URLs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Return a scratch directory.
      java.io.File getScratchDir(Context context, java.lang.String suffix)

      java.net.URL getScratchURL(java.io.File scratchFile)

    • Method Detail

      • getScratchDir

        java.io.File getScratchDir()
        Return a scratch directory.
        Returns:
        A File for use as a scratch directory.

      • getScratchDir

        java.io.File getScratchDir(java.lang.String suffix)
        Return a scratch directory with the suffix
        Parameters:
        suffix - The directory name to append
        Returns:
        A File for use as a scratch directory.

      • getScratchDir

        java.io.File getScratchDir(Context context,
                           java.lang.String suffix)
        Based on a Context, return a scratch directory.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context, must not be null.
        suffix - The directory name to append
        Returns:
        A File for use as a scratch directory.

      • getScratchURL

        java.net.URL getScratchURL(java.io.File scratchFile)
        Given a File, return an accessible URL
        Parameters:
        scratchFile - The file to use, the file not exist and be acccessible.
        Returns:
        a URL that can be used to access the file remotely.
